Method Summary
protected  void setUp()
           
protected  void tearDown()
           
 void testDoFilterAuthorizedProxyChainOne()
          Test that an authorized proxy chain gets through the filter.
 void testDoFilterAuthorizedProxyChainTwo()
          Test that an authorized proxy chain gets through the filter.
 void testDoFilterAuthorizedServiceTicketReceipt()
          Test that a request in a session including a CASReceipt representing a previously validated service ticket does get through the filter when configured to accept service tickets.
 void testDoFilterNoSession()
          Test that doFilter() sends response FORBIDDEN when there is no session into which might have been stored a CASReceipt.
 void testDoFilterNotHttpServletRequestButHttpServletResponse()
          Test that doFilter() sends response FORBIDDEN when request is not an HttpServletRequest but response is an HttpServletResponse.
 void testDoFilterNotHttpServletRequestNotHttpServletResponse()
          Test that doFilter() throws ServletException when request is not an HttpServletRequest and response is not an HttpServletResponse.
 void testDoFilterPrefixOfAuthorizedChain()
          Test that a prefix of an authorized proxy chain does not get through the filter.
 void testDoFilterServiceTicketReceipt()
          Test that a Service Ticket receipt prompts a FORBIDDEN when the filter is configured to do so.
 void testDoFilterSessionAttributeOfWrongType()
          Test that doFilter() sends a response FORBIDDEN when there is a session and the CASFilter request attribute is set but its value is not of type CASReceipt.
 void testDoFilterSessionButNoAttribute()
          Test that doFilter() sends a response FORBIDDEN when there is a session but the CASReceipt attribute is not set.
 void testDoFilterSuffixOfAuthorizedChain()
          Test that a suffix of an authorized chain prompts a FORBIDDEN.
 void testDoFilterUnauthorizedProxyChain()
          Test that an unauthorized proxy chain similar to an authorized chain but for one change prompts a FORBIDDEN.
 void testEgregiouslyBadParam()
          Test that filter initialization fails for garbage values of parameter.
 void testEmptyParam()
          Test that filter initialization fails for empty parameter.
 void testGoodParam()
          Test that filter initialization succeeds for a legitimate value.
 void testInitNoParam()
          Test that filter initialization fails when the authorized proxy chains parameter is not set.
 void testInsecureUrlsParam()
          Test that filter initialization fails when http:// (not https://) services are named in the supposedly authorized proxy chains.

testInitNoParam

public void testInitNoParam()
Test that filter initialization fails when the authorized proxy chains parameter is not set.

testEgregiouslyBadParam

public void testEgregiouslyBadParam()
Test that filter initialization fails for garbage values of parameter.

testInsecureUrlsParam

public void testInsecureUrlsParam()
Test that filter initialization fails when http:// (not https://) services are named in the supposedly authorized proxy chains.

testEmptyParam

public void testEmptyParam()
Test that filter initialization fails for empty parameter.

testGoodParam

public void testGoodParam()
                   throws javax.servlet.ServletException
Test that filter initialization succeeds for a legitimate value. If this test were to fail, all tests would fail because this logic is used in setUp() to enable the tests of doFilter.

Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException

testDoFilterNotHttpServletRequestNotHttpServletResponse

public void testDoFilterNotHttpServletRequestNotHttpServletResponse()
                                                             throws java.io.IOException
Test that doFilter() throws ServletException when request is not an HttpServletRequest and response is not an HttpServletResponse.
